Ayesha Khan.description: waking up and completing her morning routine (conversing about Ayesha Khan and Wolfgang Schulz are discussing ways to incorporate jazz music, spoken word, traditional African music, African folklore, themes of resilience, involvement of local artists and community organizations, outreach to the Black community, collaboration with Eddy Lin, exploration of inequalities faced by the Black community, and the importance of educating themselves on Black experiences to ensure an authentic and impactful project on gentrification.) @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:piano
